name: Verify that the error message is shown when user enters data less than 6 characters

children.description: Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I click the Sign up link
And I enter "v" less than six characters
And I click on the Sign up button
Then The error message "Họ và tên phải trên 6 ký tự" is shown next to the full name label

userStory.narrative: I want to verify the Sign up form

title: Verify that the error message is shown when user enters data less than 6 characters

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I click the Sign up link
And I enter "<Full name>" less than six characters
And I click on the Sign up button
Then The error message "Họ và tên phải trên 6 ký tự" is shown next to the full name label

scenarioOutline:
